channel.title: Steam Trading Cards
channel.description:
Anybody else collect these? I tried selling mine on the marketplace but since there's like 300,000 duplicates of each one it won't go anywhere.. So I decided to collect mine. If you keep your cards post them up here I guess.. Here's mine:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vaQ6ovq.png[/img]

item.title: Steam Trading Cards
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I actually sold all of mine, and made $3. I bought Vice City for free essentially… Well, like buy 8 get one free… But it still counts as free I guess.

Read full topic
